wikipedia_page.main:
John Matthew Mare (22 February 1854 – 11 December 1909) was an English cricketer.  Mare was a right-handed batsman.  He was born at Paddington, London.
Mare made his first-class debut for Sussex against Surrey in 1870.  He made 25 further first-class appearances for Sussex, the last of which came against Surrey in 1878.  In his 26 first-class matches, he scored a total of 616 runs at an average of 14.00.  An opening batsman, he only passed fifty once, narrowly missing out on a century when he scored 97 against Kent in 1872.He died in England on 11 December 1909, though the exact place of his death is not known.
